00064 #define DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR   0x21
00065 
00067 #define DFU_DETACH                  0x00
00068 #define DFU_DNLOAD                  0x01
00069 #define DFU_UPLOAD                  0x02
00070 #define DFU_GETSTATUS               0x03
00071 #define DFU_CLRSTATUS               0x04
00072 #define DFU_GETSTATE                0x05
00073 #define DFU_ABORT                   0x06
